mapper.insert: INSERT INTO counsel(category_id, charger_id, title, content, customer_name, customer_email, status, creator_id, modifier_id, created_at, modified_at) VALUES (#{categoryId}, #{chargerId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{customerName}, #{customerEmail}, #{status}, #{creatorId}, #{modifierId}, NOW(), NOW())

INSERT INTO counsel_history(counsel_id, sequence, category_id, title, content, requestor_email, charger_id, status, creator_id, created_at) SELECT c.id AS counsel_id, (COUNT(ch.counsel_id)) + 1 AS sequence, c.category_id, c.title, c.content, customer_email AS requestor_email, c.charger_id, c.status, modifier_id, modified_at FROM counsel AS c LEFT JOIN counsel_history AS ch on c.id = ch.counsel_id WHERE c.id = #{counselId}
mapper.select: SELECT counsel.id, counsel.category_id FROM counsel INNER JOIN charger c ON counsel.category_id = c.category_id INNER JOIN user u ON u.id = c.user_id WHERE u.id = #{managerId} AND counsel.charger_id IS NULL
mapper.update: UPDATE counsel SET charger_id = #{chargerId}, modifier_id = #{modifierId}, modified_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id} AND counsel.charger_id IS NULL
UPDATE counsel SET status = #{status}, modifier_id = #{modifierId}, modified_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
